articles.title: Stocks rise as Donald Trump tones down his stance on trade
articles.description: The S&P 500 climbed 1.7% and added to its big gain from Tuesday that more than made up for a steep loss on Monday.
articles.content:
US stocks rose as a worldwide rally came back around to Wall Street after President Donald Trump appeared to back off his criticism of the Federal Reserve and his tough talk in his trade war.

articles.title: Elon Musk says his time working for Donald Trump's administration will 'drop significantly' next month - as Tesla profits sink
articles.description: As a special government employee, Mr Musk was limited to 130 days in his role.
articles.content:
